headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' blob: data: https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' blob: data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https: wss: ws:; media-src 'self' blob: data: https:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
